title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Defense Wants to Highlight 'Inconsistent Statements' by FTX Insiders Gary Wang, Nishad Singh
description: Sam Bankman-Fried's defense team asked Judge Lewis Kaplan to let them introduce proof of inconsistent statements from former FTX executives Gary Wang and Nishad Singh, tied to their statements to federal officials prior to testifying on the stand.

title: 'Parallel' Game Adds Over 120 New NFT Cards in Planetfall Expansion
description: Parallel is releasing new cards for its game via blind bundles. While little is known about the cards so far, some new art has been revealed.

title: Bitfinex Securities to list tokenized bond denominated in USDT
description:
Bitfinex Securities has announced the launch of its first tokenized bond offering. According to a tweet from Paolo Ardoino, the current CTO and incoming CEO of Bitfinex, this milestone marks a “new era for capital raises through deep liquid markets and stock/fond markets,” with Tether’s USDT. The bond will leverage Blockstream Liquid, a sidechain-based settlement […]

The post Bitfinex Securities to list tokenized bond denominated in USDT appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Detective Exposes Scammer Behind OpenAI CTO & Bored Ape CEO SIM Swaps
description: Crypto sleuth ZachXBT identifies a scammer aiding 17 SIM swap attacks on OpenAI and Bored Ape execs and others, resulting in millions stolen.

title: Morgan Creek Digital Assets Co-Founder: Bitcoin Is the ‘Most Disciplined Central Bank in the World’
description: On 25 October 2023, Anthony Pompliano, the founder of Pomp Investments and co-founder of Morgan Creek Digital Assets, appeared on CNBC’s “Squawk Box” to discuss various aspects of Bitcoin with co-anchor Joe Kernen. The conversation touched on Bitcoin’s recent price surge past $35,000, the ongoing status of Bitcoin ETFs, and the broader economic factors influencing […]

title: Former FTX Boss Sam Bankman-Fried to Testify on Thursday in High-Stakes Trial
description: Ex-FTX chief Sam Bankman-Fried is slated to make his case directly to the jury in his ongoing trial, as shared by his defense lawyer, Mark Cohen. Bankman-Fried’s decision to testify comes on the heels of several witnesses who have spoken against him in recent weeks. Facing Accusations: Sam Bankman-Fried Prepares to Plead His Case Directly […]

title: Uncertainty abounds as generative AI use grows- ISACA poll reveals
description: A recent poll conducted by ISACA, the global digital trust association, has shed light on the growing uncertainty surrounding generative artificial intelligence (AI). The poll, titled “Generative AI 2023: An ISACA Pulse Poll,” surveyed over 2,300 professionals working in fields such as cybersecurity, IT audit, governance, privacy, and risk. It revealed a notable discrepancy between ... Read more

title: Pigeons Demonstrate AI-Like Problem Solving Skills in Recent Study
description: In a groundbreaking study, researchers have discovered that pigeons, often regarded as simple creatures, exhibit problem-solving abilities akin to artificial intelligence (AI) systems. This revelation challenges conventional notions of avian cognition and suggests that pigeons employ a form of “brute force” learning similar to AI algorithms. Pigeons tackle complex problems with AI-like approach Prior research ... Read more

title: Innovative AI Startup CentML Secures $27 Million in Seed Funding
description: Toronto-based CentML, a cutting-edge startup focused on optimizing computing power for AI development, has successfully raised $27 million in a seed round of funding. The investment was led by prominent backers including Nvidia Corp. and Gradient Ventures, a Google venture fund. Deloitte Ventures and Thomson Reuters Ventures also participated in this crucial funding round. CentML ... Read more

title: Kaiko reports exchange de-listings at an all-time high
description: Amid Bitcoin's remarkable comeback, a substantial number of digital tokens are facing delisting from major exchanges like Coinbase Global Inc. and Binance this year.

title: Ethereum’s Potential Surge: Navigating the Market with Arthur Cheong
description: Arthur Cheong predicts a massive rally for Ethereum if BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF application succeeds. title: Crypto Payments Platform Triple-A Announces $10 Million In Funding
description:
Crypto payments company Triple-A announced a $10 million Series A funding round. The funding round was led by Peak XV and Shorooq Partner, as noted by TechCrunch. The amount will go towards the company’s expansion into the Middle East, North America, and South America. According to a recent article by TechCrunch published on October 25, […]
